DEFAULT_LEVEL().notice: Sets level to `31` by default, which keeps all Divider lifecycle methods public (`issue`, `combine`, `collect`, etc), but not the `onRedeem` hook.

factoryParams().notice: params for adapters deployed with this factory

setAdapterTrusted(address,address,bool).notice: sets trusted address for an adapter

setRewardsRecipient(address).notice: Set factory rewards recipientall future deployed adapters will have the new rewards recipient
